July 12, 1913 D Moira Contest
Moira Contest 0 Other
moira-contest

Songs of Sentiment
Moira, Leicestershire, England, UK March contest - 1st Moira Colliery, 2nd Burton Silver. Prizes - 1st £6 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2.
Best cornet - Newhall St Johns. Best euphonium - Swadlincote. Best flugal and trombone - Burton Silver. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 1, 2018, 6:30 a.m. Oct. 1, 2018, 6:54 a.m.
1 Burton Silver [Leics.] Arthur Lawton
2 Gresley Colliery Band W. Cowley
3 Newhall Band Enoch Booth
